cast.name: 米尔顿·洛佩斯 Milton Lopes
比阿特丽斯·巴塔尔达 Beatriz Batarda

this_title: Le vent qui siffle dans les grues
introduction: Algarve, late 90s. Following the death of her grandmother, Milene - a strong young woman full of life despite a slight mental handicap - divides her life between her family of notables and a Cape Verdean family that keeps her going, whom she met when her grandmother died. The wind that whistles in the cranes plunges us into the world of two families against the backdrop of Portugal's recent past.源自：https://www.swissfilms.ch/en/movie/o-vento-assobiando-nas-gruas/13B761BC5B1843E5AC0AA6D796E6EB3E
chinese_title: Le vent qui siffle dans les grues
